telegram.token__COMMENT__: The Telegram bot token from the BotFather
telegram.use_webhook__COMMENT__: Use webhooks or poll for updates using /getUpdates?

privileges__COMMENT__: A mapping of user privileges via user id. @userinfobot can tell you user IDs.

database.uri__COMMENT__: The database URI to use with SQLAlchemy
database.trackModifications__COMMENT__: Whether SQLAlchemy is instructed to track modifications.

knightro.errormsg__COMMENT__: Generic message to show when a TelegramError is raised
knightro.errormsg: Whoops, an error occured while processing this. Try again in a little bit.
knightro.about: I am a Telegram bot made by @OzzyC for the [UCF Furs](http://ucffurs.org) group. Not associated with UCF. [More info](https://git.io/vheb8)
knightro.help:
Here's what I can do:
/whereis <loc> - Search campus for a location
/garage - How full are the garages now?

parking.url__COMMENT__: URL from which garage info will be fetched
parking.location_ids__COMMENT__: In locations.json, these are the IDs of each garage.
parking.cache_time__COMMENT__: For how long should garage capacity reports be remembered before making a new request?

navigation.locations_file__COMMENT__: A JSON file of locations on campus. Link: http://map.ucf.edu/locations.json
navigation.map_link__COMMENT__: A link to UCF's map on their website
